I think you might be in for a treat with "The English Patient"! This critically-acclaimed film is a beautiful and poignant tale of love and war, set against the backdrop of World War II. With an all-star cast including Naveen Andrews, Juliette Binoche, and Ralph Fiennes, it's a must-see for anyone who loves period dramas or historical epics.

If you're in the mood for something a bit more action-packed, I'd recommend "The Last Samurai"! Tom Cruise stars as a tough mercenary who finds himself caught up in a battle between Japanese rebels and the ruthless leader of a guerrilla army. With its stunning cinematography and memorable performances, this film is sure to keep you on the edge of your seat.
